attributes.background: Me and my partner lost our little boy on New Year’s Day of 2018 and have our own resting place for our little Alfie, somebody has been down and pinched items from his grave and now I need the help of getting more cctv installed within the grounds of carmountside crematorium

rejection.details:
We were deeply saddened to read about the death of your little boy. Please accept our sincere condolences. 

We can't accept your petition because the Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Cemeteries and crematoriums are usually the responsibility of local churches or your local council.

If the cemetery you're concerned about is run by your local council, you could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you.

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
